level.heading: DETERMINATION OF MONTHLY PRINCIPAL PAYMENT (ยง 14-2504)

level.text: Loans made to any income-eligible household under this Program shall require monthly Principal-Only payments in an amount equal to the loan amount amortized over a four hundred eighty (480) month period, and payment shall begin five (5) years from the date of the loan execution.

level.heading: SOURCE Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 28 DCR 526 (January 30, 1981); as amended by:
